videoOverlayTitle2.title: Activa Duck Player para ver contenido sin anuncios segmentados
videoOverlayTitle2.note: Text displayed as a title in the video overlay to encourage users to enable Duck Player for an ad-free experience.

videoButtonOpen2.title: Activar Duck Player
videoButtonOpen2.note: Button text to prompt users to activate Duck Player.

videoButtonOptOut2.title: No, gracias
videoButtonOptOut2.note: Button text to allow users to decline using Duck Player.

rememberLabel.title: Recordar mi elección
rememberLabel.note: Label text for an option to remember the user’s choice regarding the use of Duck Player.
